message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the initial price of $1,200,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While $1,200,000 represents the high end of the product's value, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. I believe this price reflects a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I hope this proposal is within your considerations.
